description:
Setsu sets off for the demonic continent - and into a chance meeting with the granddaughter of a certain merchant he met once in his previous life, who has her own duty to fulfill...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Going on a Trip for a Second Time
Je pars en voyage pour la deuxième fois
Tabi ni Deru no wa Nidome Desu
旅に出るのは二度目です
